Reviews.Title: fantastic price
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: great price works good ........fittings tight fit I am very happy will buy more as needed for my camera hook ups

Reviews.Title: It works like its describe to work.
Reviews.Author: Kolt
Reviews.Content: I do recommend the cable, it's slim design makes it easy to run tuck and hide, tangle resistance and flexible.

ProductInfo.Features:
100 feet audio video and power CCTV cable
The black cable is made of pure copper and of good quality
2.1mm center positive power connection type
Transmit audio video signals and supply DC power for security camera
For camera with DC power only; Free BNC to RCA adapters
ProductInfo.Name: ATC 2 PACK black 100ft Feet AV Video Audio & Power BNC Cable for CCTV Video Security Surveillance Camera with 2 RCA Male to BNC Female Connectors 3JG
